cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Workflow_Step__.name: cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Workflow_Step__c
cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Workflow_Step__.description: This table stores the junction object to identify the workflow steps that apply for each workflow.

cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Step__c.description: Reference to the business object API workflow step.

cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow__c.description: Reference to the business object API workflow.

cgcloud__Enabled__c.description: Determines whether the Step is enabled to be applied.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Defines the order in which the Step is to be applied. Steps are run in ascending order.

cgcloud__Unique_Key__c.description: Stores schema constraints. This is a technical field that the workflow updates.

cgcloud__Unique_Sort__c.description: Technical field that the workflow updates.
